message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed, deal. I'm sure we can work something out that benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed for my liking.  Let's be more realistic.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good deal considering the money will be worth less if we wait.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45. We both get a decent share, and we avoid the further devaluation of the money.
